casebody.data:
DAVFAM, LLC
v.
Arthur E. DAVIS, III No. 327P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Arthur E. Davis, III, For Davis, Arthur E. (III) Satie Munn, Attorney at Law, Trey Lindley, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, For DavFam, LLC

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th of September 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Davis, J. recused
